task.title: Run Setup.exe
task.shortdesc: As with any major program, you will need to run setup in order to install it.

taskbody.context: Setup.exe can be found in the root directory of the CD-ROM with your software.

step.cmd: Navigate to it from a typescript, DOS, or other command window.
Follow all of the prompts that appear.
It is suggested that you follow all of the defaults, but you may select an alternate directory for the install.
